generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Barlow+Semi+Condensed:wght@600;700&display=swap");*,:after,:before{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:inherit}body{font-family:Barlow Semi Condensed,sans-serif;background:radial-gradient(circle,#1f3756,#141539);color:#fff;text-align:center;box-sizing:border-box}.container{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center}.info{display:flex;width:100%;max-width:700px;justify-content:space-between;border:3px solid;margin-top:30px;border-radius:1rem;padding:20px}.title{font-size:2.5rem;align-items:flex-start;line-height:2rem;text-transform:uppercase}.Scorebox,.title{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.Scorebox{padding:12px 40px;background-color:#fff;color:#2a46c0;border-radius:5px}.Scorebox__score{color:#3b4363;font-size:3.5rem;font-weight:700}.play{display:flex;position:relative;flex-direction:column;width:100%;margin-top:50px}.play .triangle{position:absolute;align-self:center;margin-top:70px}.play .items{display:flex;justify-content:center}.play .items .icon{height:160px;width:160px;border-radius:50%;border:16px solid}.play .items .icon--paper{background-color:#fff;background-image:url(/f9c513f04ab7612c0266a55bd84ea197.svg);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:50%;border-color:#4865f4;box-shadow:inset 0 5px 6px grey,0 8px #0d31e3;transform:translateX(1.5rem)}.play .items .icon--paper:hover{transform:translateX(1.5rem) scale(1.1)}.play .items .icon--scissors{background-color:#fff;background-image:url(/d430e467b956bbe22a59fd0e9cac0503.svg);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:50%;border-color:#ec9e0e;box-shadow:inset 0 5px 6px grey,0 8px #a46e0a;transform:translateX(8.5rem)}.play .items .icon--scissors:hover{transform:translateX(8.5rem) scale(1.1)}.play .items .icon--rock{background-color:#fff;background-image:url(/e3cec4e89ffcd68ca2e6b509df4dba2c.svg);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:50%;box-shadow:inset 0 5px 5px grey,0 8px #a11b34;border-color:#dc2e4e;transform:translateX(-10rem) translateY(13rem)}.play .items .icon--rock:hover{transform:translateX(-10rem) translateY(13rem) scale(1.1)}.game{display:flex;flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:nowrap;margin-top:50px;align-items:50px}.game .result{align-self:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin:25px}.game .result .text{text-transform:uppercase;font-size:48px;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:10px}.game .result .play-again{background-color:#fff;text-decoration:none;text-transform:uppercase;padding:10px 30px;border-radius:5px;font-size:.8rem}.game .result .play-again:hover{color:red}.game__player{display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin-right:2.5rem}.game__player .text{text-transform:uppercase;font-size:19.2px;font-weight:300;margin-bottom:40px}.game__player .icon{height:250px;width:250px;border-radius:50%;background-size:50%;border:20px solid transparent}.game__player .icon--paper{background-color:#fff;background-image:url(/f9c513f04ab7612c0266a55bd84ea197.svg);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:50%;border-color:#4865f4}.game__player .icon--paper--winner{transform:scale(1.1);box-shadow:inset 0 5px 6px grey,0 8px #0d31e3,0 0 0 0 hsla(0,0%,100%,.07),0 0 0 100px hsla(0,0%,100%,.05),0 0 0 200px hsla(0,0%,100%,.025)}.game__player .icon--scissors{background-color:#fff;background-image:url(/d430e467b956bbe22a59fd0e9cac0503.svg);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:50%;border-color:#ec9e0e}.game__player .icon--scissors--winner{transform:scale(1.1);box-shadow:inset 0 5px 6px grey,0 8px #a46e0a,0 0 0 0 hsla(0,0%,100%,.07),0 0 0 100px hsla(0,0%,100%,.05),0 0 0 150px hsla(0,0%,100%,.025)}.game__player .icon--rock{background-color:#fff;background-image:url(/e3cec4e89ffcd68ca2e6b509df4dba2c.svg);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:50%;border-color:#dc2e4e}.game__player hsla(0,0%,100%,.025)}.game__comp{display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin-right:2.5rem}.game__comp .text{text-transform:uppercase;font-size:19.2px;font-weight:300;margin-bottom:40px}.game__comp .icon{height:250px;width:250px;border-radius:50%;background-size:50%;border:20px solid transparent}.game__comp .icon--paper{background-color:#fff;background-image:url(/f9c513f04ab7612c0266a55bd84ea197.svg);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:50%;border-color:#4865f4}.game__comp .icon--paper--winner{transform:scale(1.1);box-shadow:inset 0 5px 6px grey,0 8px #0d31e3,0 0 0 0 hsla(0,0%,100%,.07),0 0 0 100px hsla(0,0%,100%,.05),0 0 0 150px hsla(0,0%,100%,.025)}.game__comp .icon--rock--winner{transform:scale(1.1);box-shadow:inset 0 5px 5px grey,0 8px #a11b34,0 0 0 0 hsla(0,0%,100%,.07),0 0 0 100px hsla(0,0%,100%,.05),0 0 0 150px hsla(0,0%,100%,.025)}.countdown{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;margin-left:20px;height:250px;width:250px;border-radius:50%;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.3);font-size:8rem}.footer{margin-top:270px;width:100vw}.footer .attribution{position:absolute;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%);bottom:16px}.footer button{position:absolute;bottom:16px;padding:7px 25px;right:16px;border-radius:.4rem;border:3px solid #606e85;color:#97a2b4;background:none;font-weight:600;letter-spacing:2px}.footer button:hover{background-color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.8);color:#3b4363;cursor:pointer}.modal-container{display:flex;position:absolute;z-index:10;height:100vh;width:100vh;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.modal-container .modal-box{background-color:#fff;border-radius:7px;padding:30px;color:#3b4363}.modal-container .modal-box img{width:100%}.modal-container .modal-box .modal__header{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;margin-bottom:30px}.modal-container .modal-box .modal__header h1{text-transform:uppercase;margin:0;padding:0}.modal-container button{background:none;border:none;align-self:center;color:#3b4363}.modal-container button:hover{cursor:pointer}
